medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to identify the report/voyage number, type of message (e.g. amendment) and date/time of message of creation.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date/time of conveyance report to Customs.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to identify the number of passengers, number of crew, number of bills.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide observations, remarks and reason for change.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the conveyance's gross tonnage, net tonnage, summer dead weight tonnage, containerized/non- containerized tonnage and overall length.

medi:segment.name: General indicator
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIS, A segment to specify the import/export/transit indicator, prohibited/restricted goods indicator and unregistered spaces indicator.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify references and dates/times related to the conveyance.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers associated with the conveyance.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates/times associated with the conveyance's reference numbers.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify voyage itinerary.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the conveyance's voyage itinerary - ports of call/places.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates/time associated with the itinerary.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify supporting documentary requirements and associated reference numbers, dates/times and locations.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify supporting documentary requirements, including Certificate of Registry, Safety of Life at Sea Certificate, Maritime Health Declaration, Ship's Stores Declaration (FAL 3), Crew's Effects Declaration (FAL 4), Crew's List Declaration (FAL 5), Passenger List (FAL 6).

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers associated with a supporting documentary requirement.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates/times/periods associated with a supporting documentary requirement.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify locations associated with a supporting documentary requirement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to indicate duty/tax/fee details and monetary amounts payable related to the conveyance.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment to specify relevant duty/tax/fee information.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: General indicator
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIS, A segment to transmit a processing indicator.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify names, addresses, contacts and references relating to the message.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify declarant's name and address, ship's agent name and address, and master's name.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments specifying persons/departments and communication numbers associated with the party identified in NAD, group 5.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify the person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify communication numbers (i.e. telephone/ fax numbers) of departments or persons to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments specifying reference or transaction numbers and dates associated with the party identified in

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify numbers associated with the named party or transaction.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates/times associated with references.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to indicate details related to each leg of transport.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to specify details of transport related to each leg, including name/number of vessel/vehicle/flight, nationality of ship, conveyance reference number, type of service identifier and carrier.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to specify placement of goods or equipment in relation to the transport used.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify associated dates/times as required related to details of transport.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify locations related to each leg of transport, associated dates/times and quantity (tonnage) of cargo loaded/unloaded at each port.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify port of initial arrival, place/station of last foreign port of call (last departure), place/port of loading, place/port of discharge, quay location/position of ship in port.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify associated dates/times as required related to locations.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify tonnage of cargo loaded/unloaded at each port.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to identify equipment details and number of equipment units.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to identify the size of containers and whether empty/loaded.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to identify number of containers.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify results and date/time of the application of an authentication procedure.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment to specify results of the application of an authentication procedure.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify associated dates/times as required related to an authentication procedure.
